title: Tukima's Vorpal Blade
data:
{{Obsolete}}

This spell bestows a lethal but temporary sharpness on a sword held by the caster. It will not affect weapons otherwise subject to special enchantments. 
A [[weapon]] held by the caster will temporarily gain the [[vorpal]] [[brand]], if it doesn't already possess a brand.

This can be found in the [[Book of Tukima]]

[[Category:Enchantments]]
[[Category:Level 2 Spells]]
[[Category:Obsolete spells]]
